commitMessage: feat: implement VideoContext, useLocalStorage hook, and types
prTitle: Implement Core Data Structures and LocalStorage Persistence
prBody: Defined TypeScript interfaces for Video, Note, and Tag. Implemented a robust useLocalStorage hook with functional update support. Created VideoContext and VideoProvider to manage application state with automatic LocalStorage synchronization.
notes: Verified type safety with `tsc --noEmit`. Ensured correct functional update handling in useLocalStorage to prevent stale closures.
